content: Prof. Dr. Frantisek Franek homepage PUBLICATIONS/RESEARCH Books Submitted Papers Journal Papers Book Chapters Conference Proceedings Talks and Presentations Web Publications Technical Reports Balcar-Franek Theorem Data,  Results,  and Programs Link to AdvOL Status: retired, Professor Emeritus Name: Frantisek (Franya) FRANEK Office: ITB-108 Email: Position: Professor of Computer Science and Mathematics Education: Ph.D. (1983, University of Toronto, Mathematics) RNDr. (1976, Charles University in Prague, Cybernetics) Research Interests: Comp.Sci.
